data.current_description: Retrieve a list of Legacy Contents belonging to the account used to make the request
data.summary_suggestion: List legacy content for authenticated account
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a paginated list of legacy content items associated with the authenticated account. Supports filtering and pagination parameters to narrow results. Returns an array of legacy content objects with metadata including creation date, status, and content details. Requires account authentication via Twilio credentials.
data.reasoning: The operation lacks a summary entirely and the description is incomplete. It doesn't explain pagination support, filtering capabilities, or what the response structure contains. For AI agents, it's unclear what parameters are available, how to filter results, or what fields are returned. Added summary, clarified pagination/filtering support, specified authentication requirements, and described the response structure to improve AI agent interpretability.

message: Operation 'CreateApprovalCreate' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, unclear_purpose, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Operation has no summary or description. Added clear action verb, specified the WhatsApp channel context, explained required inputs (Content Sid and request body), clarified the return value, and described the side effect (initiating approval workflow) for AI agent clarity.

data.description_suggestion: Submits a Content resource for WhatsApp approval. Requires the Content Sid as a path parameter and an approval request body. Returns the created approval request object with status and metadata. This initiates the approval workflow for WhatsApp messaging content.
data.reasoning: Operation has no summary or description. Added clear action verb, specified the WhatsApp channel context, explained required inputs (Content Sid and request body), clarified the return value, and described the side effect (initiating approval workflow) for AI agent clarity.

data.description_suggestion: Permanently deletes a Content resource by its unique Content Sid. Requires the Content Sid as a path parameter and authentication. Returns HTTP 204 No Content on success. This action cannot be undone and will remove all associated content data.
data.reasoning: Summary is missing. Description is too minimal - lacks input details, return information, and side effects. Enhanced to specify the required parameter, clarify the permanent nature of deletion, explain the response code, and warn about irreversibility for AI agent decision-making.
